caption.p: Overall survival (OS) after first-line therapy. OS according to (A) treatment, (B) fluorescence in situ hybridization cytogenetic status, (C) type of hospital, and (D) age. F/FC: fludarabine/fludarabine in combination with cyclophosphamide; CLB+/-R: chlorambucil and rituximab; FCR: fludarabine in combination with cyclophosphamide and rituximab; B/BR: bendamustine/bendamustin and rituximab; ALEM: alemtuzumab; CHOP/CVP+/-R: cyclophosphamide +hydroxydaunorubicin+vincristine+p rednisone/cyclophosphamid+vincristine+prednisone+rituximab.
